name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 418 Water Pump Failure and Replacement Decision
description:
This NFT represents Proof 418 from MaMeeFarm™, recorded on 2025-12-31
under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

The record documents an attempt to repair a water pump used for daily
farm operations. After inspection and repair efforts, the pump was
confirmed to be non-functional and beyond practical repair.

This proof captures a real operational failure and the resulting
decision to replace essential equipment, introducing additional
unplanned costs to farm operations.

Observed details:
- Activity: Water pump repair attempt
- Outcome: Pump irreparably damaged
- Action required: Replacement with a new unit
- Impact: Increased operational cost
- Time recorded: 10:45 AM
- Date: 2025-12-31
- Context: Essential water infrastructure for farm use

This record preserves an unedited account of equipment failure and
economic pressure faced in small-scale farming, forming part of the
verifiable real-world data chain under the DGCP framework.

Location: MaMeeFarm™, Thailand  
System: DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof)

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
